proposal: #85 - 42 Week Media Order from The Kusamarian ü§ñ‚ù§Ô∏è
rationale: This proposal aims to fund Kusamarian content creation including AAG, Space Monkeys etc..
details: Kusamarian is one of the most known content creators in Polkadot space and we support him and his funding.

rationale: This proposal aims to fund the development of Smoldot light client for Q3/2023.
details: Smoldot is an alternative implementation of the Polkadot client focused on using as little CPU, memory, and bandwidth as possible. It's amazing tool for increasing decentralization of the blockchain, so we fully support this proposal.

rationale: This referendum aims to fund the development of the next stage of OpenGov voting using Discord Bot.
details: ChaosDAO has already made a Discord bot which pulls contextual data from OpenGov referenda from Subsquare and Polkassembly and allows a Discord community‚Äôs members to anonymously vote on each referendum. We support them with this amazing initiative that improves UX with OpenGov voting.

proposal: #103 [MBIP-5] Possible Solutions for Unsustainable Storage Growth - MBIP-5: Add a Storage limit per gas
rationale: This proposal aims to add a storage limit per gas.
details: There is no change to the base fee (when compared to MBIP-4). The transaction fee calculation follows the EIP-1559 standard, as this MBIP is focused on gas limit.

rationale: This proposal is to Register xcNODL as an XC-20 and open HRMP channel with Nodle Network.
details: Adding more parachain native tokens such as NODL from Nodle Network into Moonbeam as XC-20 tokens improve the multichain spirit of Polkadot.

proposal: #54 - Add iBTC & DOT liquidity to Omnipool
rationale: By that referendum approved, 105000 DOT & 6,44 iBTC will be added to the Omnipool from the Treasury.
details: Adding new liquidity to Omnipool increases trading efficiency, which is a positive thing. This is why we support this referendum.

proposal: #35 - CP53(GI): Listing CFG in HydraDX Omnipool & seeding initial liquidity
rationale: This referendum will enable listing EFG token in HydraDX Omnipool and seeding the initial liquidity.
details: Adding new Polkadot native assets such as CFG is super important for the HydraDX Omnipool liquidity and further adoption, so that's we supported this referendum.
